item.title: Brexit: Explaining the concepts of EFTA and the EEA
item.description:
Dr. Michael SÃ¡nchez Rydelski and Cath Howdle* *Respectively Member and Deputy Director of the Legal Service of the EFTA Surveillance Authority. Nothing in the present article binds or necessarily reflects the views of the EFTA Surveillance Authority. 1. Introduction This article doesn’t offer a Brexit solution, leaving that to governments and negotiators. Instead, it provides guidance on key aspects of the European Free Trade Association (“EFTA”) and European Economic Area (“EEA”)...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/brexit-explaining-the-concepts-of-efta-and-the-eea/
